replies.body:
Just yesterday I had this problem - I couldn't get past the LoL Logo and onto the LoL Client. I figured I'd reinstall, but when I tried to, it wouldn't download! I found a solution that fixed both of my problems if you'd like to hear it (: It legitimately worked for me, I just played a game on League and even though there is now no need for me to download the game again, I've found it now downloads. 
It's as simple as changing your DNS, lemme know if you want it (: My problem wasn't really entirely the same as yours though, that's all.
